Text: Sale of Assets Memois the memo I wrote It is lengthy so you could get the gist of it by reading the brief answer and conclusion where I recap the substance of the memo If there are any changes that you want me to make or anything that you would like me to add let me know Ill stop by tomorrow to make the necessary changes and additions
final draft sale of assetsthe nd draft that I sent This is the draft that I meant to sent

Capacity Allocation Agreementam sending you the Capacity Allocation Agreement Summary For a summary it is still four pages but let me know if this is the sort of thing you were looking for I tried to shorten certain things but I inserted some of the definitions for clarification of what certain terms in the contract meant I have finished the Operating Agreement also but I have to look over it before I send it I will be by to find out what changes you want me to make either this afternoon or on Tuesday if that is better for you
Operating Agreement LLCis a copy of the brief of the LLC Operating Agreement Let me know if that is what you want It is still very lengthy pages

Timber Management Agreementwanted to send you this Timber Management Agreement I just put a hard copy of it on your chair I will come by later so that we can discuss it and you can tell me what changes you would like me to make Ignore the Demand Letter Attachment I accidentally attached the timber management agreement William L Nealy

Timber Management Agreementyou have the address for Southern Timbergrowers because I have made all those changes and I could shoot it to you to take a look at and then come by but I still need the address for Southern Timbergrowers William L Nealy

Timber Management Agreementis a copy of the Timber Management Agreement with the revisions you asked me to make I still have not inserted the address of Southern Timbergrowers and I will probably come by later to confirm the italicized portions things we needed to find out from Ms Bywaters I hope this is up to your unyielding standards of perfection If not Eric has volunteered to prepare the agreement all over from scratch William L Nealy

Timber Agreementis my attempt at the clause making the counterparty liable for any decisions that they make concerning the timber services without our approval I have not been able to find the address on Lexis so I will keep looking Also the italicized portions are the ones that you had questions on I just wanted to know if Ms Bywaters ever sent answers to those questions to you because I can make those changes also William L Nealy
Timber Management Agreementjust got the address for Southern Timbergrowers Inc and it is now in the document William L Nealy
Compression Services Brieftried to be as brief as I could William L Nealy
